page.title: 18MAIN ROADS IN ELLESMERE PORT
page.content: { Ellesmere Port}is linked to the main cities of{Chester}and{Birkenhead by the main road{(A41)}and the motorway{(M53). The{A41}passes through the town on the South side and is dual carriage most of the way. It remains a busy link road despite the opening of the {M53.}The amount of traffic varies with the time of day. A recent survey shows that it was greatest towards Chester at 1300 hrs and greatest towards Birkenhead at 1630 hrs. A large part of the traffic is composed of{heavy freight lorries supplying the services and industries of{Chester and the Wirral.}These heavy vehicles have caused{damage}to the road which is now having to be resurfaced.
